name: Space Jammers
description: Space Jammers is a 1-4 player Sci-Fi rogue-ish top-down shooter. Guide an alien rock band of space kitten pirates through a fractured multi-verse. Fly starfighters, board space ships and loot local populations to fund your musical tour.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: A graphics card with at least 256MB of memory and a screen resolution of at least 1024x768. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card, or integrated sound chip. Additional Notes: It is recommended that you have the latest DirectX End-User Runtime.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or later Processor: +2Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: A graphics card with at least 1GB of memory and a screen resolution of 1920x1080. DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card, or integrated sound chip. Additional Notes: It is recommended that you have the latest DirectX End-User Runtime.
